topic.name: css-basics
topic.description: CSS is the language we use to style an HTML document. CSS describes how HTML elements should be displayed.

concept.name: add-css
concept.description:
When a browser reads a style sheet, it will format the HTML document according to the information in the style sheet.
There are three ways of inserting a style sheet:
  • External CSS
  • Internal CSS
  • Inline CSS
